text: José Manuel Cerqueira Afonso dos Santos, known as José Afonso, Zeca Afonso () or just Zeca (2 August 1929 – 23 February 1987) was a well known Portuguese folk and political musician. He became an icon in Portugal for his music criticizing the dictatorial regime of Oliveira Salazar. Afonso died of ALS. ==Other websites== * Associação José Afonso (José Afonso Association) * As Canções de José Afonso (José Afonso's Songs) * Letras de José Afonso (José Afonso's lyrics) * Last.FM entry about José Afonso * O que é preciso é criar desassossego (What is needed is to create unrest) José Afonso's last interview Category:1929 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Portuguese singers Category:Guitarists Category:Political activists Category:Communists Category:Folk musicians Category:Portuguese activists
title: Zeca Afonso
